subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A.J. Burnett allowed nine runs in a 9-3 loss to the Red Sox that left the Yankees comforted that they do not return here until the final weekend of the regular season.
snippet: A.J. Burnett allowed nine runs in a 9-3 loss to the Red Sox that left the Yankees comforted that they do not return here until the final weekend of the regular season.
